element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

p.i: Do NOT select this race unless you plan on using the Upgradeable Steel Defender homebrew! Do not modify the ability scores!

description.p: Your tinkering has borne you a faithful companion, a steel defender. It is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands.

element.name: Advanced Materials
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By utilizing rare ore in upgrading the steel defender’s armor, it gains resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

sheet.description: Your tinkering with new armor materials has bourne fruit your defender is now resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

element.name: Arcane Conduit
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You install conduits for arcane energy into your steel defender. When you cast a spell with a range of touch, your defender can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell if it is within 100ft. of you it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.
This mechanism is uniquely calibrated to you. If another creature uses the mechanism, they receive no information.

sheet.description: When you cast a spell with a range of touch, your defender can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell if it is within 100ft. of you it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it.

element.name: Arcane Link
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You develop an arcane link with your steel defender’s sensors. As an action, you can don or doff a special mechanism which allows you to see through your defender’s eyes and hear what it hears while it is within 100 feet of you. During this time, you gain the benefits of any special senses the defender has, and you are blind and deaf with regard to your own senses.
This mechanism is uniquely calibrated to you. If another creature uses the mechanism, they receive no information.

sheet.description: You can don or doff your mechanism to use your defender's senses as if they were your own. While using this mechanism you are blind and deaf to your own senses. No other creatures are able to use the mechanism.

element.name: Arcane Shielding
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You install a device which can generate a bubble of arcane energy. As a reaction the steel defender can activate the shield. While the shield is active the defender gains resistance to all damage for 1 minute.

sheet.description: As a reaction the steel defender can activate their shield. While the shield is active the defender gains resistance to all damage for 1 minute.

element.name: Arcane Sensors
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: Utilizing an array of magical sensors of your own design, you enable your steel defender to detect threats with greater ease. The defender gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

sheet.description: The defender gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

element.name: Charge Attack
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By upgrading the steel defender to be more nimble at high speeds, it gains the ability to attack while dashing. When the defender uses its action to dash, it can make a single Force-Empowered Rend attack or shove a creature as part of that dash.

If the defender moves at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before taking this action, either its proficiency bonus to its Force-Empowered Rend damage is doubled, (if it makes an attack and hits) or it pushes the target up to 10 feet away from it (if it succeeds on the shove).

sheet.description: When the defender uses its action to dash, it can make a single Force-Empowered Rend attack or shove a creature as part of that dash. If it moves at least 10 feet in a straight line immediately before taking this action, either the proficiency bonus for its Force-Empowered Rend damage is doubled, or it pushes the target up to 10 feet away from it.

element.name: Cloaking Mechanism
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: Through a series of enhancements, magical and mechanical, you create an advanced stealth system. As an action, the steel defender can become invisible. The invisibility ends after one hour, or if the defender attacks or casts a spell.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: As an action, the defender can become invisible. The invisibility ends after one hour, or if the defender attacks or casts a spell.

element.name: Clockwork Brain
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You design a clockwork brain and install it into your steel defender. The defender gains an intelligence score of 6, and allows it to utilize items imbued with your infusions with the exception of weapons and arcane foci. It gains the ability to speak the languages that you know.

sheet.description: The defender gains an intelligence score of 6, and allows it to utilize items imbued with your infusion with the exception of weapons and arcane foci. It gains the ability to speak the languages that you know.

element.name: Defensive Array
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By upgrading the steel defender's protective plates and shielding, you allow it to defend itself more effectively. The defender can now use shields and always has a shield available.

sheet.description: By upgrading the steel defender's protective plates and shielding, you allow it to defend itself more effectively. The defender can now use shields and always has a shield available.

element.name: Extra Attack
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: Faster moving appendages allow the steel defender to attack rapidly. The defender can make two Force-Empowered Rend attacks whenever it takes that action on its turn.

sheet.description: The defender can make two Force-Empowered Rend attacks whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

element.name: Flame Spout
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: The steel defender is upgraded with a flame weapon. As an action, the defender can send out a blast of fire. Each creature in a 5 ft wide 30 ft line starting from the defender extending in a direction of your choice must make a Dexterity saving throw against you spell save DC. A target takes 5d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This damage increases to 6d8 at 13th level and 7d10 at 17th level.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: The defender sends out a blast of fire. This attack does {{flame-spout:die-count}}d{{flame-spout:die-size}} fire damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line (dex. save) DC {{flame-spout:dc}}.

element.name: Flexible Plates
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You reinforce the steel defender's joints and exposed areas. The defender’s AC becomes 16 (natural armor).

sheet.description: You reinforce the steel defender's joints and exposed areas. The defender’s AC becomes 16 (natural armor).

element.name: Grapple
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You upgrade the body of your steel defender, outfitting them with hooks, clamps, or another appropriate addition. When the defender attacks a target with their Force-Empowered Rend, the defender can use its reaction to attempt to grapple the target.

sheet.description: When the defender attacks a target with their Force-Empowered Rend, the defender can use its reaction to attempt to grapple the target.

element.name: Greater Runic Engravings
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By inscribing more powerful arcane runes onto your steel defender, it is able to utilize more spellcasting abilities. The defender learns a cantrip of your choice from the artificer spell list. It uses your spellcasting ability.

sheet.description: The defender learns a cantrip of your choice from the artificer spell list. It has a spellcasting modifier of {{Arti Int Mod}}.

element.name: Hair Trigger Springs
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By honing your steel defender’s reaction times, it becomes able to avoid damage with lightning reflexes. When forced to make a dexterity saving throw to avoid taking damage, the defender takes half damage on a failed save, and no damage on a success.

sheet.description: When the defender is forced to make a dexterity saving throw to avoid taking damage, it instead take no damage if it succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

element.name: High Tension Springs
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: Utilizing springs made of a superior alloy, you increase the steel defender’s movement speed. Your defender's base land speed increases by 10 ft. If the defender has other movement types, their speed also increases by 10 ft.

sheet.description: Your defender's base movement speed(s) increase by 10 ft.

element.name: Improved Repertoire
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You make modifications to the steel defender that allow it to perform certain tasks more effectively. The defender gains proficiency in a skill of your choice. You can select this upgrade multiple times.

sheet.description: The defender gains proficiency in a skill of your choice.

element.name: Larger Chassis
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You upgrade the chassis of your steel defender to create a larger, more powerful frame. The size of your defender increases to large.

Additionally, the defender’s hit die becomes d10 and its constitution and strength scores increase to 16, however it's dexterity score decreases to 10. Your Force-Empowered Rend now deals 2d8 + PB force damage on a hit. Hit points are recalculated when this upgrade is taken as follows: 2 + your intelligence modifier + six times your artificer level.

As an action, the defender can temporarily reduce to the size of medium as its internal parts and multiple joints compress on itself. It can then return to its large size without any action, or after 10 minutes. Remaining compressed for more than 10 minutes causes the defender to suffer 1d6 fire damage at the start of each of its turns, as its power generator begins to overheat due to the lack of space.

sheet.description: As an action, the defender can temporarily reduce to the size of medium it can without the use of an action, or after 10 minutes. If compressed longer than 10 minutes it takes 1d6 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. The size of your defender increases to large. Your hit die now increses to {{level}}d10. Your Force-Empowered rend now deals 2d8 + {{proficiency}} force damage on a hit. Your new hit point maximum is {{vital-hp}}.

element.name: Locomotive Adaptation
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You attach fins, webbing, grappling hooks, burrowing claws, or other appropriate locomotive aids. The steel defender gains a swim speed equal to its highest speed, a climb speed equal to its highest speed, or a burrowing speed equal to half its highest speed. You can select this upgrade multiple times.

element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You increase the reach of your steel defender’s melee attack, by adding tentacles, lengthening arms, or another appropriate modification. The defender's range for Force-Empowered Rend increases by 5 feet.

sheet.description: Increases the range for Force-Empowered rend by 5 ft.

element.name: Magically Warded
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You provide strong antimagic enchantments for your steel defender. The defender has advantage on saving throws against spells.

sheet.description: The defender has advantage on saving throws against spells.

element.name: Nimble Flight Control
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You attach wings, propellers, or propulsion to your steel defender, enabling it to fly. It gains a fly speed equal to 20 feet. Additionally, it does not provoke opportunity attacks while flying.

sheet.description: It gains a fly speed equal to 20 feet. Additionally, it does not provoke opportunity attacks while flying.

element.name: Overdrive
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You develop a system which allows your steel defender to generate a surge of energy for a short flurry of activity. As an action, the defender may double its speed until the end of its turn. The defender may then make a single Force-Empowered Rend attack against each creature it can reach during its turn. It has advantage on attack rolls, and opportunity attacks have disadvantage against it.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: As an action, the defender may double its speed until the end of its turn. The defender may then make a single Force-Empowered Rend attack against each creature it can reach during its turn. It has advantage on attack rolls, and opportunity attacks have disadvantage against it.

element.name: Overload
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: The steel defender is upgraded with an energy discharge weapon. As an action, the defender can release a blast of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder energy from its body. Each creature within a 20 ft cone must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A target takes 5d10 damage of the given element on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This damage increases to 6d10 at 13th level and 7d10 at 17th level.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: Release a blast of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder energy. This attack does {{overload:die-count}}d{{overload:die-size}} of the desired elemental damage in a 20 ft. cone (dex. save) DC {{overload:dc}}.

element.name: Powerful Build
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You strengthen the lifting and pulling capabilities of your steel defender. The defender counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

sheet.description: The defender counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

element.name: Precision Instruments
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You graft fine tools onto your steel defender allowing it to adeptly perform specific tasks. The defender gains two tool proficiencies of your choice, and it always has those tools available.

sheet.description: The defender gains two tool proficiencies of your choice, and it always has those tools available.

element.name: Relentless
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: A variety of backup systems are installed into your steel defender. If the defender takes damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it instead is reduced to 1.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: If the defender takes damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it instead is reduced to 1.

element.name: Reserve Power
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You install a node for conducting magical energy, enchanted to spontaneously repair your steel defender. Whenever the defender uses its Repair ability, you can expend a spell slot to restore an additional 2d8 hit points to it.
When you expend a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

sheet.description: Whenever the defender uses its Repair ability, you can expend a spell slot to restore an additional 2d8 hit points to it, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

element.name: Riding Harness
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You design and craft a special saddle or harness to aid in using the steel defender as a mount. When an attack targets a creature that is using the defender as a mount, your defender can force the attack to target itself instead. This saddle or harness functions as an exotic saddle.

sheet.description: When an attack targets a creature that is using the defender as a mount, your defender can force the attack to target itself instead.

element.name: Runic Engravings
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: By inscribing arcane runes onto your steel defender, it is able to utilize some spellcasting abilities. The defender learns a cantrip of your choice from the artificer spell list. It uses your spell attack modifier to hit. The defender can cast this cantrip without any verbal, somatic, or material components. You can select this upgrade multiple times.

sheet.description: The defender learns a cantrip of your choice from the artificer spell list. It has a spellcasting modifier of {{Arti Int Mod}}.

element.name: Smoke Screen
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You attach a mechanism capable of creating a 20-foot-radius sphere of thick grey smoke centered on a point within 120 feet. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.
Once your defender uses this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

sheet.description: As a bonus action you create a 20-foot-radius sphere of thick grey smoke centered on a point within 120 feet. It lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed disperses it.

element.name: Spark of Intellect
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

p.em: Prerequisites: 17th level Artificer, Clockwork Brain Upgrade

description.p: Through an inexplicable breakthrough in the design of the clockwork brain, your steel defender gains an Intelligence score of 13.

Choose two level 1 spells, a single level 2 spell, and a single level 3 spell from the artificer spell list. The defender can spontaneously cast each of those spells once per long rest, without providing material components. It uses your spellcasting ability.

sheet.description: The defender can spontaneously cast each of those spells once per long rest, without providing material components. It has a spellcasting modifier of {{Arti Int Mod}}.

element.name: Upgraded Sensor Array
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You work to advance the sensor modules on your steel defender. The defender gains blindsight out to a range of 30 feet.
In addition, the defender can make a perception check to search for hidden enemies as a reaction instead of an action.

sheet.description: The defender gains blindsight out to a range of 30 feet. You can make a perception check to search for hidden enemies as a reaction.

element.name: Upgraded Foundation
element.source: Atelsi's Secrets of The Dragon's Maw

description.p: You improve upon the foundation of your steel defender's build. Choose one ability score from Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, or Wisdom. The defender's score for the chosen ability increases 2, up to a maximum of 20. You can take this upgrade multiple times.
